actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain exports of fully automatic or semiautomatic assault weapons.
short_title: Assault Weapon Export Control Act of 1991

summary.text: Assault Weapon Export Control Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit the export of a machine gun or semiautomatic assault weapon, with exceptions for U.S. departments or agencies and for foreign governments not engaging in gross human rights violations or supporting international terrorism. Sets penalties for violations of this Act. Defines "semiautomatic assault weapon" as a semiautomatic firearm which is not generally recognized as particularly suitable for, or readily adaptable to, sporting purposes considering specified characteristics.

titles.title: Assault Weapon Export Control Act of 1991
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain exports of fully automatic or semiautomatic assault weapons.
